statements: SELECT * FROM qr_payments
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM qr_payments WHERE payment_status='pending'
SELECT qr_code, payment_status FROM qr_payments WHERE amount > 100
SELECT payment_status FROM qr_payments ORDER BY payment_id DESC
SELECT payment_id, amount, qr_code FROM qr_payments WHERE payment_status='success'
SELECT * FROM qr_payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT qr_code, amount FROM qr_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Success' ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT payment_id, qr_code, payment_status FROM qr_payments WHERE amount >= 50 ORDER BY qr_code;
SELECT payment_status, payment_id, amount, qr_code FROM qr_payments WHERE qr_code LIKE 'BC-%' ORDER BY amount DESC, payment_id;
SELECT * FROM qr_payments WHERE payment_status IN ('Pending', 'Failed') AND amount < 50 ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM qr_payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM qr_payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT qr_code FROM qr_payments WHERE payment_status = 'success';
SELECT * FROM qr_payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM confirmation_messages ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, qr_code, payment_status FROM qr_payments WHERE payment_status = 'pending' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM qr_payments WHERE amount >= 50.00;
SELECT payment_id, qr_code FROM qr_payments WHERE qr_code LIKE '%ABC%';

SELECT qr_payments.payment_id, qr_payments.amount, qr_payments.qr_code, confirmation_messages.message_text, confirmation_messages.timestamp FROM qr_payments INNER JOIN confirmation_messages ON qr_payments.payment_id = confirmation_messages.payment_id;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM qr_payments WHERE payment_id IN (SELECT payment_id FROM confirmation_messages);
SELECT * FROM qr_code_payments;
SELECT qr_code_id, amount FROM qr_code_payments WHERE payment_status='Pending';
SELECT id, amount, payment_status FROM qr_code_payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT qr_code_id, payment_amount, payment_timestamp FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM confirmation_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, qr_code_id, amount, payment_status FROM qr_code_payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, qr_code_id, amount FROM qr_code_payments WHERE payment_status = 'completed';
SELECT qr_code_id, payment_amount, payment_timestamp FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT id, message_text, timestamp FROM confirmation_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT qr_code_id, payment_amount, payment_timestamp FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, payment_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM qr_codes ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT qr_code, payment_amount FROM qr_codes WHERE payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, qr_code, payment_amount FROM qr_codes WHERE payment_amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT id, message_body FROM confirmation_messages ORDER BY sent_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM qr_codes WHERE payment_status = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT qr_code, payment_amount FROM qr_codes WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT qr_code FROM qr_codes WHERE qr_code LIKE '%ABC%' AND payment_amount < 50 ORDER BY qr_code ASC, payment_amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = FALSE ORDER BY payment_date ASC, payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT qr_code_id, confirmation_message FROM QRCodeMessages WHERE qr_code_id LIKE 'QR%';
SELECT * FROM SuccessfulPayments ORDER BY success_payment_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, failure_reason FROM FailedPayments WHERE failure_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT qr_code_id, confirmation_message FROM QRCodeMessages;
SELECT payment_id, qr_code_id, success_message FROM SuccessfulPayments WHERE success_payment_id < 10;
SELECT history_id, status, time_stamp FROM PaymentHistory WHERE status = 'Successful';
